Description :
        Rui Okamoto who grew up in the countryside, dreams of a naughty life together with a handsome boyfriend in Tokyo! So he heads to a gay bar! On his way there, he meets Kei, the top host of a host club. Instantly spellbound by his beauty, Rui ends up unintentionally walking into his host club...!! "I love cute guys like you." With a deep kiss, forcibly entangling their tongues together, makes Rui's body melt on the spot...!!
